review_text: Our extended family stayed at the house while we were in town for the wedding of our son. The house was spacious and comfortable with all of us there. Our only regret was not planning to stay longer because we enjoyed the peaceful surroundings and house so much.
The location was perfect for our visit. We were close to all of our destinations. Close to town, but still far enough that we didn’t feel crowded. The house is beautiful!

We loved it. plenty of space for our family gathering. All of them are talking about coming back again for our next get together.
So much better than trying to gather in a hotel.
We were really taken the views of the sunrise and sunsets. We could even see the northern lights from the lovely back yard on Friday night.
Jim S

The Yellow House on the Hill was a great place to stay. With plenty of room for my five sisters and myself. We loved the location close to anything we needed yet secluded. We enjoyed the fantastic views as we created lots of memorable moments. Jean was an excellent host. I would most definitely stay here again. Thank you for the use of your lovely home.
Staying at Jean’s was comfortable, easy, and we felt very much at home.
Great place Jean was always easy to get ahold of very nice host and her place is beautiful
The description of the house was spot on and Jean was more than helpful with everything! Would definitely recommend to anyone!
An excellent place for a cozy stay just outside the city, but peaceful and rural

Yellow House on the Hill was absolutely beautiful! The house is immaculate, spacious (huge rooms!), and even better than the pictures suggested. Our extended family had room to spread out in the home and the large yard provided an area for walks and play. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone looking for a quiet Airbnb in the country!
Such a great, big, and beautiful house! Definitely recommend for families. Kids enjoyed the big yard all around the house. Plenty of bedrooms and bathrooms for everyone. Jean was a great host!

Stayed here for a Girl's Getaway for 2 nights, 3 days. Senior ladies, three of us mobility challenged; we selected this home because there were 3 bedrooms on the main floor and it was described as handicap accessible. There are some suggestions we will make to enhance senior/mobility safety, but the home was lovely and quite comfortable with beautiful views. There is a beautiful front porch and back patio with seating along with extensive outdoor area for kids to play. Although the location is secluded, both historical Richmond and it's business district is only 10-15 minutes away. Planning to return with family and grandchildren in the future.

We love the yellow house!! It’s beautiful, spotless, and well stocked. Sets the bar high for our future Airbnb adventures. Very friendly and responsive host that made our complex trip that much easier. Thank you so much!! If we ever travel to Indy again we would definitely stay in the yellow house again!! Five stars!!!!

Our stay was beautiful! The space provided by the host gave us vibes that allowed us to connect with family and enjoy time together without the hustle of bustle of reality! A true oasis, and we will be back! Thank you!
Had a great time at the yellow house! Beautiful home and setting and very large space that was well equipped.
Jean was fabulous! Everyone was very pleased with the house and location. Two thumbs up!!!
Great place to stay. Created memorable moments for me and my family after being overseas for a year. A great blessing and worth it for the time with those you love.
Another great stay at this home. The host is extremely easy to correspond with and the house is perfect.
Amazing grounds, quiet & private.
This house is a hidden gem. It was great for our family of 7 adults and 2 little ones. Beautiful grounds, tons of room. I highly recommend!
This place was amazing. I would definitely recommend this place. It is so peaceful and beautiful.

It exceeded everybodys expectations. The house was large enough inside and out we didn't feel crowded.
Very well supplied we didn't need a thing. This house and host highly recommended.
Thank you for sharing your home it was a very enjoyable stay.
Super spacious place and Jean was a great host.

Oh my goodness! Jean's Yellow House on the Hill was the perfect place for us to stay during our family reunion weekend. There was plenty of room for 8 of us (two different families) to hang out together but also have private rooms for sleeping. On two nights, we had additional family members join us for visiting (back deck, spacious front porch, large space for yard games, beautiful sunset). We gathered in the family room for a genealogy presentation, and were able to use the dining room and living room for displaying pictures. Jean was a great host! We hope to return soon!
the place was perfect!

We were recently in Richmond for a wedding. As city dwellers, we thought it'd be fun to spend the weekend in the country. We were not disappointed. Jean's home is absolutely lovely, and surrounded by beautiful meadows and wide open space. We especially enjoyed quiet mornings out on the huge porch watching deer and listening to the birds.
This home is immaculate, cozy and spacious. The kitchen is well-appointed, the beds are very comfortable with nice-quality linens. The baths are spotless and well-stocked with everything we could have needed.
Jean was very responsive and helpful in our few communications. All in all, it was the perfect weekend get-away and we would definitely stay here again when visiting Richmond.

We had a wonderful stay at this Idealic setting. What a beautiful and tranquil place. It was just as described. the pictures don’t do this place justice. It feels like you’re 50 miles out into the country when in reality, you’re only 3 miles away from the city and the stores. I highly recommend this Airbnb to anybody that wants to have a nice getaway.
This property is beautiful and tranquil as described! It was so spacious and had great amenities
Loved the stay here in Richmond. Beautiful house and location and Jean was very helpful, and responded quickly. We look forward to staying here in the future when visiting family.
This was a great and pleasant stay
Wonderful house...great views...just a lovely place and roomy...could not ask for anything more!!!!!

This was our second time here and we loved it just as much as the first time! So very peaceful and beautiful and has the space to accommodate our family. We had a wonderful time with our kids and grandbaby!

Jean's place was terrific. One of my best experiences with an Abnb. would recommend to anyone interested in a quiet, beautiful place. Spacious and peaceful. Next time I'm in the area, I will be booking if avaliable.

This is the second time we stayed at Jean’s lovely home. The location is a meeting place for family gatherings. It is very clean, comfortable and accommodating. Our stays have made memories for years to come.
great Host and airbnb would definitely Re-book in the future!
Great communicator, was exactly as described, beautifully kept home..You won't be dissapointed!

Loved the location. The house is situated on a hill over-looking the surrounding country side and neighboring houses are well hidden by the landscape. Enjoy your morning coffee while watching bluebirds on the patio and hawks in the field.

We really enjoyed our stay at Jean’s place! The house was bigger than expected and very comfortable for our family. We had two crawling babies here and it was spacious and clean for them to play. It was so nice to have several full bathrooms. Additionally, the view from the large living room windows was beautiful! Jean is a friendly and flexible host. We will definitely stay here again!

Beautiful, tranquil setting. The home is even nicer in person than the pictures portrayed and much bigger! It fit our large family perfectly. Many upscale finishes, everything was very clean and tidy. I love the antique finishing touches. The location was close enough of a drive to all the locations we needed, the picturesque rolling hills and neighbors’ farm setting was comforting. Jean was an excellent host, providing her cell # if needed. Very happy with our stay and will return in the future. Thank you!
VERY NICE PLACE
This is a great place.
This property is absolutely STUNNING. So inviting and comfortable. Very private setting with high end touches. We travel extensively and this was an absolute GEM 💎 HIGHLY recommend a stay here.
Amazing place plenty of room and feels like home.
Great house and value. We would stay here again. Lots of room for three couples. Wonderful view!
An excellent place to stay. Beautiful country place with every thing you might need.

I hosted a small family reunion (50 people total including ten children) at this house and it was absolutely perfect! The floor plan flow makes moving around very easy, and offers plenty of spaces for feeling like you're all together or small nooks to have more one on one conversations. The front porch and garage were nice alternatives for additional space if we weren't able to be outdoors due to rain. The expansive property gave us plenty of room to spread out for kickball, croquet, bocce ball, and other games. And out of town family had places to stay for the night. This house would be great for small family gatherings, smaller office parties, work retreats, and baby/wedding showers.
The host was wonderful and accommodating to our specific event. I really couldn't have wished for anything better. And the 360 views from every window in the house are amazing!
We had a very comfortable and relaxing stay at the yellow house on the hill!!

This home and property are absolutely beautiful!!! You will love your stay here and the huge beautiful yard to play in! Beautiful views and it feels like you’re in the middle of nowhere even though town is only a couple of minutes away.
An absolute perfect house. You won’t find anything that could top this place in Richmond.
Perfectly equipped and spacious for the whole family. We loved seeing deer in the field at twilight. We’ll definitely stay here from now on when we come to visit.

This hilltop home is beautiful, peaceful, spacious, and so comfortable. With four bedrooms, three on the first floor, accessibility for old knees is appreciated. The kitchen is well equipped, the beds comfortable, one downstairs room with twin beds is decorated for kids, and she has child-proofed all the outlets we saw with protectors. 3.5 baths allowed for all of us to have our own space. I loved having the Bluetooth speaker and business center with printer for doing the bit of work needed, and streaming my favorite music. Roku tv in the living room and in the upstairs bedroom also worked well. Hummingbirds visit her feeder often, and we were told to watch for deer but didn't see any. The "yard" is enormous, grass cut widely but with flowers and longer grasses beyond. So loved watching the sun go down from the patio, and the swallows swooping for bugs at dusk. Her property abutts a pasture of shy cows, but we didn't hear them moo from the house. I am so happy to know Jean's home is there for us the next time we need a getaway.

Yellow House on the Hill was absolutely amazing. So spacious! Felt like home! Loved sitting out on front porch with cup of coffee in the morning and on the back patio in evening and watching the deer. Close to restaurants and yet quiet country setting. We will be back again!

What a beautiful home!!! The setting was phenomenal with the sunrise off the front porch and the sunset at the back patio. Jean's house was absolutely perfect. Our trike group enjoyed the opportunity to stay at this wonderful home. It is completely equipped with all you will need for your stay. We loved the opportunity to cook our own meals and even enjoyed the barbeque grill. Jean is just a phone call away, if you need anything. The hammock on the front porch was a great way to spend a lazy afternoon. We will definitely come back when we are in the area.
Beautiful home and great location! Very private and quiet. Excellent home for a large group or family. Host was very attentive, home was extremely clean and comfortable.

We celebrated our annual brothers brothers weekend at
Jean’s place and everything was perfect. We highly recommend this home to any group gathering. Jean was perfect host.

This was more than perfect for what we needed for a large family to come from out of state for a family reunion. Beautiful home, amazing views and so peaceful. I would definitely recommend to anyone visiting the area. I hope to rebook in the future.

A beautiful spacious home with many aminities and peaceful surroundings was perfect for my family's getaway. There was an issue upon checking in. However, Jean was very responsive and took care of everything right away.
Great house on a beautiful property. Jean was responsive and helpful.
Great place to stay. The house is clean and very spacious. There’s a lot of land on the property to enjoy too.

You will not be disappointed! Lovely home, great location and atmosphere:) beds were comfortable, master shower big enough for 2:) hours the front porch and hammock , with ceiling fans the patio so serene! We will be back!!
Great house, it was so roomy. Very private, had a huge porch and yard. We absolutely loved the space in the master bedroom and bathroom and the walk in shower and closets!!
Absolutely amazing property to get away and relax, and maybe even have some fun! Great secluded vacation getaway with an amazing view of the sunset every night from the patio.
Beautiful house with lots of light and outdoor space including a covered porch. Internet was good for working.

I booked this Beautiful Country house to come to my daughters graduation in Earlham College. I couldn’t have found a better place to stay. Just 10 minutes away from Earlham, on the out skirts of the city, but still close enough to everything. We loved our stay. Super clean house with amazing views through the house. The Host is was very responsive to my messages. We locked the bottom lock of the key pad entry lock and she came to help my family within 5 minutes.
Thank you Jean once again for renting us your beautiful house!! 🙏🤗
Wonderful house with a lovely view and a peaceful country setting!
House was very clean and accommodating. Would recommend!
Absolutely beautiful property. Very spacious and clean. Great host!
Very nice place, nice private setting. Clean and Comfy

Beautiful home with plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy in a beautiful setting with rolling hills and trees. Excellent views of the sunrise and sunset from the big porch and patio. The waterfall in town was a hidden gem and the convenience of being in reasonable driving distance to Dayton, Cincinnati, and Indianapolis, offered many opportunities for day trip excursions for all kinds of activities.

This house is a wonderful gift and was just the space our family needed to meet, play games and enjoy a visit. The area is scenic with rolling hills. It is clean and stocked with anything needed for a wonderful stay. We will be back to enjoy again. Thank you for sharing.
Great house on a great piece of property. Good communication.
Great location in Richmond and a nice house.
She was so so nice and very helpful with everything! It was my first time using Airbnb and I’m very glad I got such a wonderful host as my introduction!
We enjoyed our stay and would recommended to others.
The house is cool and quirky with modern updates. Tina was responsive and so nice.

Tina’s place was perfect! Charming, comfortable, clean, close to everything we wanted to do in Richmond. I felt like it was a great value and it is much more spacious than the pictures make it look! My kids thought the loft was so fun. Thank you for having us!
This place was easy to get to and clean. Tina was friendly and helpful with all our needs. We would definitely stay here again.

Great stay at Tina’s during our visit to Earlham College! The Guest House was extremely comfortable for the three of us, and Richmond was unexpectedly interesting. The history of the city, its roots in music and the ties to Tina’s house were fascinating. The Guest House itself is beautifully renovated inside, truly impeccable. It has absolutely everything you need for a comfortable stay. We felt right at home, and Tina was a gracious and responsive host.
Very very beautiful home so far best home we have stayed in in the area !! Highly recommended!!

We had a bit of trouble unlocking the door but Tina rectified that right away. It was Thanksgiving weekend and the kitchen was well supplied with utensils. But I had forgotten to bring my grater and she brought one over to the Carriage House immediately.
My husband and I stayed in the room downstairs and my son, his wife and 2 small children slept upstairs, it was really nice for them to have that space to themselves.
Lots of blankets and linens were provided. There were space heaters in the bathroom and kitchen which added a nice touch. And coffee fixings were there to start our day!
It was a very good experience and I would like to go back sometime when we are not so busy with family and Thanksgiving.
Skip every hotel in Richmond and book this place. It is charming and in the best location. It made our visit!
Tina had a great place, it was clean well stocked, well decorated and a good location
We were in town for an Earlham college reunion, and Tina's place was perfect. Scattered as we were, she was incredibly helpful. Thank you!

We enjoyed staying at this beautiful cottage. Inside was well furnished and decorated.
Bed were comfortable and wifi and TV worked great.

Absolutely STUNNING home. Excellent host, beautiful and well maintained home, and literally the perfect spot for my bridesmaids and I. would absolutely recommend this location to my friends and family!
It was a wonderful place to stay, felt like home, we loved the back porch, and Tina was a wonderful host.
The stay was amazing and was everything was great. Fantastic host, fantastic place.. highly recommend.
Very cozy and charming place! You can walk to lots of places or a short drive down the road for shopping or restaurants.

I've stayed at multiple AirBnBs in Richmond and this is one of my favorites. It's comfy and cute and super close to Earlham's campus. And there is plenty of space, including a perfect patio to hang out with friends and have coffee. Highly recommend!!
We had a great stay at Tina’s place for two nights. Everything was as described and had a nice decor, we would come here again for sure!

This is absolutely one of the most comfortable and well though out Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at! For the wonderful des, to the comfortable decor, let alone all the well thought out comforts of home, I would highly recommend staying here when in the area. Additionally, Tina was responsive and great to work with!
Really lovely place to stay. Clean, close to everything, and great host. Can’t wait to stay there again.

We loved the guest house! The layout was perfect. Deco was superb. Loved the library. Tina lives nearby, and that says so much about the location! She was a very pleasant and knowledgeable host. My granddaughter attends college in the area, and we will likely stay there again.

The Gennett house carriage house was a beautiful AirBNB. We loved how it was decorated, and everything was spotless and designed with a guest's comfort in mind. Our boys played with the board games on hand, and the host, Tina, even offered to give us a tour of the historic Gennett mansion. It was incredibly interesting to talk to her about the history of the area, and we took up way too much of her time, but it was much appreciated! We would definitely stay here again.

I've been visiting Richmond a lot recently and have grown tired of the hotels that have sprung up around I-70. Well just a few miles down US40 - Richmond's Main Street - is this delightful little carriage house behind the historic Gennett Mansion. 1000% better than a hotel and conveniently located too. Loads of vintage charm - since it was a originally a carriage house it feels like a cabin inside. The kitchen is nicely stocked with cooking essentials - we visited the Farmers Market on 6th Street the Saturday morning of our breakfast and made ourselves delicious dinner and Sunday morning breakfast! Also just down the road from Starbucks and other restaurants and across the street from Glen Miller Park.

Awesome Cottage! We loved our time in Richmond. Tina was the perfect host, and I would love to stay again. She has games, books, paper products, and kitchen staples, which is most convenient. All the beds are comfortable for a good night's sleep.

We reserved to attend a family wedding. I appreciated the well equipped kitchen so that I could assemble the wedding cake! It was a relaxing space when we weren’t busy with wedding details. The groomsmen were able to use the upstairs for preparing and chilling.

What a fantastic experience! My family loved the guest house so much, it was such a beautiful and cozy home away from home. We appreciated how well-stocked and pretty everything was, and Tina was a fantastic and helpful host at every turn. The Gennett Mansion is a beautiful piece of Richmond history, and it was a joy to be a part of it, and have the opportunity to learn more about our surroundings.
This was easily my best experience with any type of guest rental or AirBnB, I fully plan on booking it again next time we're in town. I recommend this AirBnB wholeheartedly!! You can expect a comfortable and charming stay that will leave you with a greater appreciation of Richmond.

The house was very nicely maintained, cute and a perfect place to access the Universities in Ohio - which is why we were in town. The town itself did not have a lot to do but had the essentials of grocery and necessities. Looked like it was once a vibrant town that now has a lot of vacancies due to shifts in industry. We needed a base to go back and forth to Oxford, OH to Miami of Ohio and that was perfect. Tina was thoughtful and had little kind details like a welcome card and a gift for us for my son's graduation. I would stay again. She was organized, had all we needed for a easy, short stay.
The place was wonderful! Clean, quiet, and perfect for myself and my friends.

Staying in the carriage house was so special. It’s historic and sits behind a beautiful, well known historic mansion in my hometown.
Tina is a wonderful host and she is passionate about historic preservation in Richmond.
A bonus for us- lilacs in bloom on the property!
A beautiful home, decorated adorably. Great location. Comfortable beds. Great for a girls weekend with our 91 year old mother. Kitchen is wonderful, well stocked. Tina was a great host!!!

Our family fully appreciated the hospitality of our host. Wonderful space that met our needs and allowed us to spread out and enjoy!
Beautiful home and accommodating!

My daughter and I came to town for a funeral and needed to find a place for just a few days. Tima accommodated our check-in and check-out times outside the posted times which was so helpful to us. The home is so cute and beautifully decorated. We enjoyed watching TV in the comfy living room and really felt right at home. I will definitely recommend this place and I will stay there again in the future.
This was a very cute and cozy place to stay! Very spacious and we felt right at home.
Tina was absolutely great, responsive, and easy to communicate with. The house was spotless, there were multiple heaters to accommodate temperature, and the location is very convenient.

We stayed here while visiting family in the area and loved being able to feel at home. We were able to relax and unwind as well as host an evening of games and dessert. Tina was so helpful and very generous with her time and recommendations. We will certainly stay here again on our next visit.

Our stay couldn't have felt more like being home. Spotlessly clean, well appointed, cozy and comfortable. It was everything we hoped it would be. Tina is a wonderful responsive and cheerful host. We'll definitely be staying here again!
Convenient location and easy access to Richmond locations! The place was well stocked and well decorated, and we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.
Adorable, clean and comfy. Loved our stay.
Beautiful and great location! Thanks Tina!

This is the perfect place to stay in Richmond! It’s a beautiful home with a lot of history. It’s also centrally located and incredibly cozy, with a number of great amenities—including a lovely little patio area and a private parking lot.

My mom, sister, and I stayed at this location for our first ever girls getaway and we absolutely loved this place. As stated, it was the old carriage house to the Gennett Mansion in Richmond, IN that has been updated into a guesthouse. All I can say overall is WOW!!! Not only was this place beyond our expectations of cleanliness, location, communication with the host, size, and character, but it is also rich in history of Richmond, IN. We had so much fun learning about the history of Richmond and the Gennett's and ended up choosing the perfect weekend to go as well as it was their annual fall festival. There was so much to do in this location and this place is seriously the most adorable guesthouse. Tina was the ultimate host, always responding in a timely manner and she also offered us a tour of the Gennett Mansion which was the perfect close to our trip. We definitely plan on staying here again!

This place was just perfect for us. It was straight out of a Better Homes and Garden magazine. The house was very clean and well stocked. There was a nice seating area out back that was perfect for hanging out.
We definitely will be staying here again when we visit Richmond!!

This was an amazing stay. EVERYTHING was well thought out and made to welcome guests. Incredible details, excellent location, comfortableseating areas, it's all there! I have stayed at 2 other options in Richmondand this one took the cake. Will definitely be back!
Lovely home.
Beautiful place with plenty of space. Very clean and Conveniently located to the main road. The place is decorated so beautifully not a detail missed loved all of it. Thank you
Tina was an incredible host! Incredibly helpful and accommodating. Can not thank her enough for her hospitality.
Great place! My family truly enjoyed their stay. Tina was a fantastic host!

The is one of the cutest homes with the sweetest hosts. The beds were comfortable and the entire home was cleaned immaculately. Tina is super attentive and responsive. Beautiful place to stay, 15/10 would recommend!

This cozy yet spacious house was the perfect place to spend time during my anniversary! Theres plenty of things to do in the surrounding Richmond and Liberty area, including hiking, museums, and the old Gennette Records building (my favorite trail as of yet). Tina was responsive and even allowed us some leniency on check out due to our crazy busy day! I am definitely going to be returning!

The space was so clean and cozy! The area was so cool with all the historical houses in the town! Found several local food places and thrift shops that were a lot of fun to experience. We plan on staying again!

Location was perfect for us.
Check in was easy.
We came in late and left early so did not get to enjoy the beautiful outdoors as we would have liked.

Very cute cottage with plenty of room. The gated entrance wasn’t working and door to house left unlocked so not very secure. Hair all over the sheets on one of the beds and check out instructions required us to strip our own beds so the cleaning fee seems excessive.
We had a great stay, would definitely recommend to others coming to Richmond!

Just as described in the listing and such a sweet and darling cottage! The location is so incredibly beautiful and peaceful as well! Nicole was so incredibly kind, responsive, and accommodating. I booked this place last minute in a winter storm that I was traveling in with my daughter. We were so thankful to get off the road, and so pleased to have such a cozy and lovely place.
Would definitely recommend or stay again!
Great place, lots of character!
It was beautiful and nice I didn’t no wear the first aid kit was I burnt my hand on a cup, besides that it was amazing
Thank you for hosting us! The only thing I wish we had was the history of the brick home on the property! Watching the deer from the living room window was a fantastic bonus!

We really enjoyed our stay! We were in town for a last minute work trip. We had a minor issue upon arrival but Nicole went out of her way to take care of our needs and to make sure that we had a very comfortable stay. She was super responsive and helpful and checked in on us throughout our trip. The house was beautiful and absolutely worth the stay!

Nice with enough space for our large family. We were warned about the low kitchen seating so we didn't use the kitchen at all. The description was accurate but the spiral staircase was a bit of a surprise. We tried to keep the small children on one floor. The games were great and the upstairs and downstairs living areas are large and comfortable. It was a bit musty smelling. Great for a one night stay with five adults and four kids

Nicole’s place was cozy and comfortable. It was the perfect place for a quick girls’ trip. Lovely location and Nicole was a helpful and responsive host. My friends and I are already trying to plan when to go back.
We had a very comfortable stay and everything was just as it was described in the listing. We would definitely stay here again.
Clean and comfortable. Convenient location, great host.
Great place at a very reasonable price.
This was a great alternative to holiday inn which was to full
Absolutely beautiful! Great setting and location, with lots of room for everyone! Highly recommend staying here! Great host and great experience!
A wonderful cute place. Very clean and cozy. Perfect location. Very scenic grounds. Great vibe! Sleeps a lot for it's size. 5 stars all around!

Loved staying at this cute and spacious cottage. Feels like home. Attention to detail was nice, and there was plenty of stuff to cover us in case we forgot anything. Good selection of books and games to browse through. I really like the outdoor patio even though we didn’t have much of a chance to enjoy it on this stay because of rain.
Really appreciate the private entrance it feels very private and secure. Instructions were given with pictures, which is always nice :)
Thanks for having us we will definitely stay here again !
Place is private, gated, secure, unique, host was flexible and communicated well. While pleasing to the eye it could use a facelift.
A perfect cozy cottage for friends and family in Richmond, Indiana!
Beautiful cottage in a spectacular setting! We absolutely loved our stay! Thank you Madeline!
great place to stay, you'll love it,
Great secluded location in the heart of the city. Wish we would’ve stayed longer. Enjoyed our stay!
No complaints! Met our needs; thanks for the stay!
great host and great communication.
Our family enjoyed the time we spent there. Beds were not real comfortable. Treacherous steps from driveway. Lovely location.
Quiet place. Worked for our large group.

We were staying in the area as we were from our if state and attending my mother's funeral services.
As the loss of a loved one can greatly impact your ability to think straight I mistakenly booked for one night instead of two.
I received a call during my mother's funeral service which I didn't recognize and when in the limbo on the way to the cemetery I returned the call and found we should have been in the process of checking out as they had someone else booked for that day and needed to clean.
My daughter's rushed back to the Airbnb to retrieve our belongings which the cleaners had graciously placed in bags for us
The hosts were very interesting and only charged us an extra $50.00.
The cottage was very quaint and had everything we needed for comfortable stay
Beautiful house with plenty of room for our whole family. The location was amazing and the house is well stocked with games and books. I would definitely recommend this for families.

Description had listed the kitchen as fully stocked. There were seven of us staying there, and I don’t think we even had enough forks to use for one of the meals. So we had to wash dishes because there is no dishwasher but we had to wash in order for everyone to be able to eat. Also, I believe the listing says that it can accommodate 12 people but the table, I think only had three chairs at it. The living room definitely did not accommodate that many. There was a really musty old smell when we came into the house. The outside furniture wasn’t very clean so we were not able to use that. And in the kitchen, it was quite dark. There was one light in the kitchen that had two bulbs, and one of the bulbs was burned out. There was no light over the sink . Main bathroom shower water did not come out that great.
Hosts were very responsive and kind.

This is the second time we stayed here and it’s so nice to have a private and quiet place to be when we were done with our day. The house is great, it has such character and they hosts were always super quick in their responses. Super great place 10 stars if I could.

We used this location as a staff retreat. There were five wonderful and comfortable bedrooms, two bathrooms (so everyone had their own space and we weren't crowding one another), games available, a walking trail, a beautiful back patio under the trees, and a space for us to gather for accomplishing work as well as bonding. This will certainly become a yearly retreat center for us.
absolutely wonderful place! can't wait to come back as soon as possible!
This is a great place to stay if you have a large number of people traveling. The nature walk to the waterfall is a short hike for a cool reward and the house all-in-all is quite private.

The cottage is in a beautiful setting. Peaceful/quiet/easy to get to restaurants shopping, etc. Two friendly neighborhood cats welcomed us. Many original features to the cottage -- bedrooms are small with various sizes/types of beds/comfort. Host is very responsive to questions/concerns.

The cottage was a lovely space to share with our family while in town for our oldest son's wedding. The accommodations were clean and comfortable. lenty of space for the 8 of us to spread out. We were together without being on top of each other. The grounds were beautiful and the outdoor space was perfect for the cool evenings especially for this group from Florida :) The location was very convenient for our wedding events in Connersville. We would certainly stay here again.
The stay was great! Very simple and easy check in and the host even had a bottle of wine for the guests! Definitely would stay again.

Its a beautiful setting,but when we got inside it felt like someone lived there and just stepped out while we stayed a night. There were glasses and a ring on the counter. A plate with leftover food under the upstsirs twin bed. The full bed upstairs really creaks with every move! The wine was a delightful gift, we say thanks!
Perfect spot, perfect place. So happy we had this location and I hope to book again. Glad for the extra attention paid to every detail.
Our group had an amazing time at this home. lots of room and beautiful area

We had a great place to stay for a group for graduation weekend! Close to restaurants and grocery stores or coffee shops. Plenty of room for a big group. Hosts were quick to respond to questions or concerns. The house was decorated nicely and had everything we needed.

The cottage is even more lovely than the photos - lovely private place, very comfortable.
Great place to stay. Would definitely look here for future visits.

So clean. So comfortable. So welcoming. So lovely. A beautiful space in a lovely town. Everything you could need. We hope to return so we can relax and explore Richmond. Great hosts - Highly Recommend.

We will consider staying again if we return to the area.

We have been staying here for the last 10 years and have always had a good experience. The owner is very welcoming and responsive to anything we might need. The house is very clean and comfortable.
This was an excellent rental just where we wanted to be! Cheryl was super to chat with about local restaurants and places to visit.

house was perfect location was perfect and the neighborhood was nice and quiet like I had remembered being from the area and everything about the house was just like Cheryl put in the bio
I couldnt be more happier with everything and would stay there again
Cheryl's place in Richmond is absolutely wonderful. Loved our time in her home, inside and out on the porch. Lovely neighborhood. Was the perfect place to stay for our family, including our dog.
Cheryl was great with communication and cleanliness. She made check in so easy and it’s a great sized house and location! Thank you Cheryl!
We really appreciated being able to stay at Cheryl’s home! She was extremely helpful, communicative and a great host. The home was clean, quiet and safe. We’d stay there again!

A beautiful old home that really makes you appreciate how bland and utilitarian houses are today. Extremely clean. Cheryl was a wonderful host who did absolutely everything to make me feel at home and welcomed. I look forward to staying with her again.
This is a very nice place to stay at..and Cheryl is a great host

We absolutely love this place Cheryl is a fantastic host and the house is very clean and cozy the beds are very comfortable we just simply loved staying here so if we are ever in Richmond Indiana again we will definitely stay here again so I highly recommend it if you are ever in Richmond Indiana look Cheryl up you won't be disappointed

The house is old, spacious, and clean. Large kitchen. Wonderful porch looking out onto the park across the street. We appreciated having desks in the rooms, and a lovely reading nook. Cheryl was a wonderful host.

All you need is a change of clothes. Cheryl’s place has everything else. Front porch was great for morning coffee. Tons of space. Quiet neighborhood. Very comfortable. I needed to work while we were in town visiting friends. Wifi worked great. Our dog was welcome. I can’t say enough good things. I definitely recommend Cheryl’s place if you find yourself in Richmond. We would definitely stay here again.
Worth every penny! Cheryl is a great host!

Cheryl’s place is amazing. Great communication all around and she was very helpful when needed. My roommates and I felt very safe throughout our 3-month stay and would 100% stay here again. Cheryl’s husband even shoveled the snow off of our sidewalks very early so we could get to our cars easier before work (at least 6 inches of snow at times!!) We loved it here!

Our stay was over Christmas. I had question after question regarding how the home would be set up since we had little ones that needed to be assured "Santa" could find the home. Cheryl was wonderful, answered every question promptly and had the place decorated with a lovely tree. This home has lots of extra touches that are out of the normal, making it feel like home. We intend to stay again when we need to be in the area. Thanks Cheryl for doing it "right"!!

Everything was much better than I anticipated. In every possible way. Hospitality, cleanliness, style and size, responsiveness and friendliness, as well as tips for local places to explore. For me this experience makes me never want to use a regular hotel again.
Would definitely recommend this host without hesitation.
Awesome place to stay very clean .Felt like home

The accommodations were incredible. Everything was clean and the host made sure we had everything we needed. The living space was comfortable and the beds were great. I particularly loved the fireplace because it added a cozy element to the fall evenings. I also loved the decorative touches which made it feel very homey. I’ll be sure to book this again during future visits!
Fantastic place. Would stay again.
Beautiful peaceful location. It was a great place to stay while riding the nearby Cardinal Greenway. Great hosts, well stocked. I recommend it to anyone traveling in the area.

Only stayed for 2 nights but I loved it! Reminded me of back home, peaceful, beautiful and out in the country. When nightfall hit I was able to go outside and look at the stars and see several fireflies while enjoying the peaceful night. Linda greeted me and was an exceptional host with great hospitality. Would absolutely stay here again.

Only there for one night but exactly as described, very clean and quiet and location was beautiful. Would absolutely stay there again and highly recommended! Linda was very attentive and greeted us upon arrival-very private and quiet, my German Shepherds also enjoyed themselves!
Great time great space great hospitality
One of the most wonderful hosts and such amazing hospitality on our short stay but would definitely stay again...and great brownies!!
Best place I’ve stayed at with the most wonderful host!
excellent host, Linda and John helped us out with a vehicle problem and a pet problem very helpful
I was only there for one night but it was a very nice setting and apartment will be happy to stay again

My husband and I were moving across the country. Linda’s home was our halfway point. It was a welcome retreat after 13 hours on the road. Linda was sweet, welcoming, and accommodating, even with our late evening arrival and large moving truck. She provided plenty of snacks and waking up to the beautiful peaceful country was a pleasure! Thanks so much, Linda!
Linda was absolutely amazing. She was so gracious and amazing. She made breakfast was welcoming to my dog
I loved my stay Linda was a awesome host super kind and generous just an amazing stay can't wait to go back

LINDA AND HER HUSBAND WERE WONDERFUL. THEY WERE BOTH VERY FRIENDLY AND WELCOMING. THE LITTLE HOUSE WAS VERY CLEAN AND COMFORTABLE. THEY HAVE A WONDERFUL SET-UP IN A VERY BEAUTIFUL SETTING. THEY HAVE A LONG ZIPLINE SET UP FOR YOUR DOG (OURS LOVED BEING ABLE TO SNIF AROUND WITH FREEDOM, BUT NOT RUNNING LOOSE. WE WOULD DEFINATELY STAY AGAIN IF IN THE AREA.

Linda was a great hostess. Met us at the door and gave us a tour to make sure we knew how everything worked. The farm was beautiful! Our dogs ran off to explore and when they did not return Linda and her husband immediately went into action to help successfully retrieve them! We are so grateful!
Super clean and the best hospitality I’ve ever experienced by a host. Added bonus of a beautiful country setting.

We loved Linda’s Airbnb. It’s a beautiful and peaceful location. We were very happy and comfortable. The dog also had a great time, lots of outdoor space to run around.

If you're looking for the perfect quite country getaway, this is the place to stay! Peaceful, beautiful, quite, great views. Farm animals near by, perfect for hiking, picnic, etc.
We loved every minute of it, looking forward to go back. Thank you to the Wallace family for their kindness and hospitality.

Wonderful stay here for the solar eclipse. It's a large property in beautiful Amish farm country. Very quiet and peaceful. I could hear the faint clop-clop of horse drawn buggies on distant roads, and the railroad couple miles away. Far enough from big cities that you can see many stars.
Apartment is very nice and cozy size for 1 or 2 (400 sq ft). Furnishings comfortable. Kitchen well equipped -- full size fridge / freezer, microwave, toaster oven, K-cup. No stove but didn't miss it. Kitchen well stocked w essentials and snacks. Everything clean. Dish TV and WiFi worked well. You can park right at the door & only 2 steps up into the space. The rest of the building is a large workshop -- all very quiet.
Hosts live in the main house and are very friendly, helpful, and easy to reach. Home-cooked meals and pies were delicious and unexpected. I felt very welcome. Hosts appear new to AirBnB but I can't think of anything to improve. Hope to return someday. Highly recommended!!!

What a wonderful quiet spot! The hosts met me upon arrival, gave me TV and heating instructions. The place was clean and we'll stocked. I was traveling with 3 puppies and sadly was not able to leave their place as clean and tidy as I found it. Thanks for being such great hosts!

Very cozy and comfortable. Super quiet in the country. Plenty of towels provided. Tv in living area and bedroom. Linda made this space very inviting and is interested in your comfort. Loved the fresh flowers! I wish I could take this Airbnb with me everywhere I go with my dogs because it was so convenient.
My wife and I stayed a couple nights on an antique picking excursion

Perfect size space for me, my boyfriend, and our dog. Very large dining and living room area for hanging out with family and game nights. The kitchen was absolutely adorable and cozy! The bed was super comfy and we loved sitting on the balcony in the mornings/evenings to watch the trains and the people go by. I’m originally from the area and definitely see myself staying here again when I come back!

My boyfriend and I, as well as our three dogs, stayed here for the night. We arrived at about 645p and check in was very easy. The place was clean, the bed was comfortable and the water pressure/temperature was amazing.
Some suggestions I’d have is getting a curtain or something to prevent people from looking in through the glass door. We left at 3a and there was someone trying to get into the loft (very disoriented) which was scary. Another thing would be a gate to create a barrier for dogs to not have access to those stairs. Also a bigger TV for that living room space. It’s a very tiny TV for the area and I couldn’t see the screen.
Overall though, amazing price. I LOVED the porch, I didn’t even know it had one. We would stay here again! :)
Thank you so much!
If you’re ok with two bars below, and a train wizzing by often- then book this place for a convenient and comfy place to stay!
Very nice
We didn’t get to take advantage of every amenity, but the comment from my 18 year old was, “I could live in a place like this!”

Very spacious apartment, the pet friendly part was the best. The host had treats for dogs nice touch. Little noisy at night since its close to couple bars, we still slept like babies. Would stay here again.

Oliver and Miranda were great hosts. The location was easy to find and the loft was spacious. There were some cleanliness issues from what I believe was a previous guest and Oliver and Miranda were responsive and happy to resolve for me.
Really cool place! Instructions were clear, there was space to park, and the bed was very comfortable.

If you like nightlife, and a fun getaway for a weekend this was the place to go. It had a nice balcony, a big living room area, and a very unique feel. Overall a great place to for a friend's trip or romantic getaway, the stairs were a little narrow and steep but besides that, an awesome place to stay.

Staying at the loft was exactly where we needed for a quick sleep before finishing our trip. The nearby trains were happening often and that was a plus for one of us :) We weren't able to sleep in the bedroom because there were no windows to the outside but if you were averse to outside noise, this would be the best spot to sleep for sure. Eclectic stay, really fun decor, neat to stay in such an historic area, especially for the price--was a great deal. We could not find a garbage can, so we took our trash out with us as there wasn't a lot. The skylights and balcony were very unique highlights. We did not come with pets but this would be PERFECT if we had furry travelers, certainly. The nearby bars were not incredibly loud but again, we slept on the couch so if the noise was an issue, sleeping in the bedroom would likely help! Overall definitely as advertised and much thanks to owners for the opportunity for the overnight!
Nice little place in Richmond. It’s also in walking distance of a couple bars and restaurants.
very nice place. close to where we needed to go

Massive space in a beautiful old building. Our dog literally could run laps in there. Some noise from the freight trains, but the house makes up for it. A very unique and memorable experience in a thoughtful home in a cool forgotten historical town. Check out the Firehouse pub and some local murals-- also close by to many antique shops. Loved our short stay.
Large space
Great space and an effortless experience!

This was a great spot for an overnight stay with our dogs! The layout was open and made for a great work environment for a day. We were able to find multiple spots near us to take the dogs out, and accessing the apartment was super easy. It’s definitely a very quiet spot of town, which for a working day away was perfect. The only real sound came from the train, but after the first few times of it going by we had it tuned out fairly easy.

Absolutely fabulous Airbnb, great hosts, really cute bohemian space and so very roomy and comfortable. Very thoughtfully done, and this part of Richmond was really interesting with murals, colorful old buildings and breweries and cafes within walking distance. I wish we could stay longer - if I could give 10 ⭐️ I would!
Great place to stay especially for the price
The space was very ambient and intimate. They had great communication usually only took 10 minutes for a response. Would love to stay again!

The pictures don't do justice to how spacious and beautiful this home is. The hosts were extremely clear and responsive, and they pushed to get me checked in as soon as possible. This is the only place I would book should I travel to Richmond again.

Love the vibe here! Super close to coffee shops and food. Would definitely stay here again! Oliver and Miranda were quick with communication and accommodated our needs. I highly recommend them as hosts!
Absolutely loved the space and the location! You could walk to restaurants, pubs, and stores for shopping. The loft is absolutely adorable with a balcony for end of day relaxation.

My partner and I only stayed for one night as we travelled from Indiana to Columbus. We loved the loft and were able to do a little bit of exploring in our short stay! There were bands playing at the pubs downstairs, so we stopped by and enjoyed the live music. In the morning, we stopped at a really cute coffee shop on 5th Street. The bagels were amazing! Communication with the hosts was very easy. They responded quickly to our messages and were very nice. Great place to stay and very nicely furnished/decorated!
Great space and location. Very walkable to restaurants, breweries and bars. Large living space, very clean.
This was our 4th stay here, we will continue to stay here for our work trips.

Oliver and Miranda's place was such a nice place to stay on our road trip cross country. It's such an amazing space, a beautiful loft, nicely furnished, with everything you might need. We personally loved watching the trains go by from the balcony. It started snowing while we were there which added to the magic - we almost spontaneously booked a second night to avoid the snowy drive and play pac-man instead! It has a good location, close to good restaurants and coffee - wish we could have explored more but we loved the BBQ place around the corner. We will definitely be coming back on our next trip that direction!

We had a very brief stay, arriving very late and leaving very early, so we did not have the opportunity to fully explore the space or outside environs. We liked the uniqueness of the location (downtown across from train depot) and the uniqueness of the space (spacious, historic building, creative decorating, modern kitchen appliances). Communication with the host was excellent, and getting into the space was easy.
There were, however, several things we didn't like. There is new hardwood flooring in the living area, but it made a crackling sound as you walked on it. We were surprised at the overall musty odor within the space, and cigarette odor in the bedroom. I am a strong fan of cotton bed sheets, and did not like the synthetic-fiber sheets that felt slippery.
Cheaper than a hotel, more spacious than a hotel, worked great as a travel stop!

I loved the novelty of this unit and only wish I’d had more time to explore the area! My daughter had stayed there once before and thoroughly enjoyed the community! But the apartment itself was tastefully decorated and unique! Communication was excellent!

We loved staying at the loft with our dog. It was the perfect place to stopover on a cross country roadtrip, and we will be back! Clean, clear communication, comfy bed and full size fridge! Thank you!

What a great space in downtown Richmond. The loft is really well appointed, with tons of space. There are train tracks across the street, but it didn’t bother us at all. When I had an issue at arrival (at midnight!) they were immediately responsive. Great apartment with great hosts.

Loved this space - very spacious and chic with lots of room to lounge around. We didn’t really use the kitchen but if we would have been happy with it if we had needed it! Will stay here again if we are in town.
Cute, comfortable, private, well-appointed. Lots of evening spots within walking distance.
Nice place, conveniently located, right downtown, and the hosts are very responsive and helpful.
Was in town for work and this was convenient. Enjoyed dinner at the Cordial Cork which was an easy walk.
This has been our 3rd different stay here for our work trips, no complaints at all, we will continue to stay here.
this loft was a warm and spacious place to nest! location was great-had a nice dinner on the block! grateful to know it's here. thanks oliver and miranda
Perfect place for a restful night and was able to avoid staying in a hotel. If I’m ever in the area again, I will definitely stay here.
Amazing space, beautifully decorated. Oliver & Miranda are fantastic. Reasonably priced. My new favorite location!

Such an amazing loft! Felt safe and right at home. Was decorated beautifully and simply just had no problems at all. Hosts super responsive and friendly, just an overall great experience and investment. Saw an earlier review about the water pressure and definitely noticed it was perfect haha. Would stay here again.
This has been our 2nd stay here for our out of town work. Great space and location, no complaints.
Perfect location and perfectly priced. Its now our go-to place to stay in Richmond! **highly recommend eating at the cordial cork. The mashed potatoes w/gravy was so good!
thanks so much thanks for giving that special at home experience. we hope to return next year
Appreciate you letting us stay at your place!

PROS: (we would stay here again)
- very cozy/spacious
- complimentary coffee
- very short walk to all kinds of good restaurants, coffee shop, book store, ice cream shop, etc.
CONS: (you'll probably need earplugs)
- this airbnb is sandwiched in between two pubs/bars. From about 11pm - 3am it was VERY noisy and I could not sleep because of the numerous people standing right outside the door laughing, arguing, yelling etc.
- train runs by directly across the street numerous times day & night.

My stay was so comfortable and easy! Oliver and Miranda were so clear with instructions and very proactive. The place was easy to find and I had no trouble getting in and settled. The apartment is beautiful and larger than the pictures portray. I greatly appreciated the very quick communication and friendliness. I would definitely stay again when I’m traveling through the area next. Highly recommend!

Our stay in Richmond at Oliver & Miranda’s place was wonderful! The space is quite large, and the skylights were definitely a more unexpected highlight of the place!
The kitchen was well appointed, though we mainly ate at Roscoe’s Coffee Bar & Tap Room (10/10 would recommend!). The bed and the couch were QUITE comfortable and great for our stay. Lots of extra blankets, great temperature control, etc. and the water pressure in the shower was GREAT!
Parking is ample in the area, and free!!
Important to note:
This location can be a bit noisy. This is to NO fault of the owners, just the nature of the Depot District in Richmond. The train runs outside and honks as it passes and E Street Pub is pretty popular and is the downstairs neighbor to Oliver & Miranda’s place. I am not a light sleeper so I didn’t mind it one bit. My friend said that a little noise from a sound machine and it drowned out any noises very well - just keep in mind if you are really sensitive to sound!
We enjoyed everything about this space except for the active train track nearby.

This was the perfect location for us. We came from Muncie by bicycle on the Cardinal Greenway for a one night stay. We loved the unique space with skylights giving natural light. You will hear a couple of trains, but it's not too bad. There is even less neighborhood noise in the bedroom. We enjoyed being able to watch some episodes on Netflix and we should have fired up the Pac-Man game sooner. Maybe next time!

This loft is an absolute gem! We were looking for an easy, pet friendly place to stop over to break up a long drive and Oliver and Miranda's place totally fit the bill. My husband loved it so much he kept saying that he would live there long term! We had no problem with the bar downstairs and did not smell any cigarette smoke or hear anything during the night. Comfy bed, great kitchen and stylish lodgings. Richmond is such a cute town - we'd never heard of it before stopping but are so glad we did regardless. Filled with Italianate style houses and incredible murals everywhere, it was fun just walking the dog around the area. Had a good meal at The Coridal Cork and picked up some coffees in the morning at Roscoe's Coffee Bar before heading out. Definitely would recommend this loft - reasonably priced for a wonderful experience!

Location is wonderful with lots of places to walk to. Plenty of space and the bedroom was quiet. Can hear the trains but can easily drown them out. Water temperature and pressure was great. Bed was comfortable and allowed us to enjoy a great weekend.

Wonderful Airbnb located in depot district. Close to restaurants and coffee shops. It was perfect for us for our weeklong stay with our dog. Highly recommended if you’re looking for a place in Richmond.
It was good, not great. The host were great.
The place is as describe. Great communication and super easy check in. A lot of space. Great value.

I had a few questions I needed answered before selecting this place as a quick sleepover on a drive through town. Their response was quick - within minutes! The apartment was cozy and we felt right at home. Everything was great! The only draw back IMO is the smell of cigarette smoke from the nightclub below. We could definitely smell smoke what seemed like all night long (it was a Wednesday evening). As some of the other reviews state - it’s hot in the bedroom. If you’re smart and read reviews before booking, then you already know this & it won’t be an issue. Would stay again if we ever find ourselves back in town.

This Airbnb was in a cool town with plenty of old building to look at. The place itself was way bigger than the pictures make you believe. I loved the look and feel of the place especially the brick walls and nice kitchen.

Accommodations were as described. Cool rehab of the building into this space. Could hear the bar downstairs at bed time but the provided air purifier and fans helped. Love the PAC man! Fun place to stay!

Stayed for one night instead of getting a hotel since we were just passing through. We enjoyed our stay Oliver and Miranda were really attentive and accommodating, would definitely stay here again in the future!
Awesome location and space, Oliver and Miranda were excellent hosts where communication was easy and smooth. If I’m ever in the area I would only want to stay here.

The loft is much bigger than the pictures show! It is an incredible space in a super cool location and we would have loved to stay longer if not live there permanently! Oliver and Miranda were extremely helpful and they responded super quickly!

Perfect location for walking and exploring the Depot. Excellents restaurants/bars within walking distance.
It was hot when I was there, and the bedroom didn't cool off even with two air-conditioners running, made it difficult to sleep. A box fan was provided and that helped. The floors needed a good cleaning.

lovely and spacious place! super cozy and comfortable. the loft had two small ac units but due to the summer heat of richmond it was a bit stuffy, nonetheless i would definitely book again in the fall/winter :) super responsive and great hosts!
Nice location. Looks like the pictures except bigger. Great water pressure in the shower. Right downtown. Close to everything.
Good stay/good location for restaurants/shops.

Beautiful loft! I cycled in from Muncie and Oliver and Miranda's place was right off the Cardinal Greenway, incredibly easy to find and very clean and welcoming. They were responsive and made sure I had everything I needed. Would stay again on my next Greenway trip!
A beautiful loft with so much space!
Super cute loft and a fairly quiet industrial style neighborhood. Would definitely stay again.
My second time here! Oliver and Miranda are super responsive, it’s a cute, clean and comfortable spot! Highly recommend
A really unique and beautiful space that is both comfortable and cozy! Would stay again for sure.
Second time staying here on a cross-country trek. Awesome, spacious loft, and very peaceful. One of the best pet-friendly places where I've stayed.
Absolutely stunning space. Easy access. Nice, quiet neighborhood.

We had a nice stay at this sweet loft! The decor was super cute, lots of seating areas, big kitchen and big kitchen table, plus board games and Pac-Man. The only little thing if you are prone to getting overheated like me =) was that the bedroom didn’t have it’s own AC unit and it got fairly hot in there. There was an AC unit in the kitchen, hallway and the main living space but not the bedroom and because of the structure it didn’t pump that much air into the bedroom. We understand it’s summer time and heat is to be expected and they did provide a big plug in fan in the bedroom but with the door closed it still got fairly warm. Just something to keep in mind. But other than that we had a nice stay. And such a good price for the value and space in the loft! Our dog loved it too. They even provided some doggie treats inside. =)

Oliver & Miranda’s place was an ideal stopping point on our road trip from Raleigh, NC to Cedar Rapids, IA. It had everything we needed, plus a fun Pac-Man mini arcade game. :)
Such a nice stay on our way to Indianapolis. After being cooped up in our car for so long it was so nice to get to the Airbnb and just be able to relax in a clean and homey environment.

Oliver and Miranda were so accommodating. So quick to respond and very attentive to our needs! The loft is adorable! A well decorated space and a perfect spot to rest! I recommend the loft to any travelers! Do not miss this gem on your travels!

Oliver & Miranda’s loft is a sweet oasis right in the town of Richmond. It was comfortable, clean and was a treat to arrive to after a long day of traveling! They were very responsive and highly recommend!
Great place to stay. Easy to get to. Plenty of on street parking and public parking lot a block away. Inside was clean and cozy and felt like so much room.
Super comfortable and spacious apartment in a nice neighborhood!
Cool loft with lots of space in a sweet town. Had everything we needed to be comfortable and have a good time. Would definitely recommend!

Fantastic place to stay! Easy to find, easy parking, very comfortable. Kitchen was well supplied, and there were great restaurants and breakfast places within a quick walk. The greenway was also a quick walk for running and biking! Only sorry I had just one night to stay. This is a great value
We loved the location, perfect for a weekend exploring what Richmond had to offer!
Fantastic place to stay!

Such a nice, cute apartment. It's spacious and inviting. Nice in-town location. Near by train tracks and much road construction right on the street where the building is located. Of course, the owners can't control these factors but that explains our lower ratings for some topics.
Great loft in a cool location. Easy to find and access. Very comfortable stay after a very long drive. We would stay again!
Beyond lovely! The interior architecture is historic. The decor well suited. Very comfortable furniture. There were games and a Pac-Man machine. Had a great night. Wish we could have stayed longer
Great space! Great location!

Oliver and Miranda's loft is so beautiful and cozy! This was our first adventure with an airbnb, so we were nervous, but they made me feel relaxed with every aspect! The loft is so comfortable with all the amenities needed. we came in late on Thursday, we walked around the town. There were a couple of bars open with live music, which we enjoyed ! The next morning, we made our breakfast and had it on the adorable balcony (with a quick trip to the local coffee shop). We highly recommend this place!
Ample space to vacation with my child! She enjoyed the PacMan game console. 😊
Beautiful loft, very responsive to questions. Nice soft bed-perfect quick night!

Amazing place that's well-decorated, very spacious and comfortable. Perfect alternative to an extended stay hotel for a business trip. Great location and walkable to a few restaurants and bars. The hosts were easy to communicate with and quick to respond.

Visited Earlham for a college tour and wanted to find a place close by to spend the night. This place was perfect! So adorably decorated and a perfect location. Great value! Instructions were very clear as to how to access the entrance and Oliver and Miranda were extremely responsive. Very comfortable bed and lovely living area. My daughter and I loved the Pac Man game in the living room. I would definitely return and highly recommend! Check out Thisthlewaite Falls if you have time - and the Richmond Farmer’s Market!
Enjoyed our stay at the loft. Easy to access all we wanted to do in the area. A fun place to stay, would stay again if in the area.

We enjoyed our stay and will return for future family events in Richmond.
Jason and Zoey Indianapolis.
We loved the open space and the decor. The town was very nice to walk around in as well.
Really nice accommodations. Kids enjoyed it.
Very clean! Great atmosphere. Will definitely stay again. Thank you for the accommodations!

We loved our stay at the loft. The space is huge and has lots of charm. The area has lots of great restaurants and bars. The hosts were very helpful and informative and everything was easy. We would definitely stay again and recommend!
Perfect little spot. Great value great experience!
Good place. Good location. Easy to find.
Very cool space and great hosts. We hope to stay here whenever passing through the area.

This place was lovely, there was lots to see in the surrounding area and Oliver and Miranda were quick to respond and help if I had any questions at all. I would stay here again if I came through the area.

Our jaws dropped when we walked into the loft. It is SO BIG! Cute and comfortable. Easy walking distance to many things. My husband enjoyed a great cup of coffee from Roscoe's. The train is close, but we love trains so that was a bonus for us. Stayed on a Tues night so it was quiet. Oliver was super helpful and really responsive when we had an issue with getting in the front door after going out. Bed was comfy and we slept well. We so appreciate being able to bring our dog. We will definitely stay again on our way through.

If you're looking for a downtown loft experience, this is it. A great combo of modern and vintage decor with high ceilings and plenty of space. The skylights brought in wonderful natural light during the day and the night-time thunder storm was spectacular!
Everything was provided that you could ever need. A great home away from home. We highly recommend Oliver and Miranda's Laurel Loft!
Great place in Richmond, especially if you are looking for a longer stay.
Nice, big space in a walkable part of town. It was a great deal.
Loved this loft! Super cute inside and Oliver and Miranda were awesome host! Would definitely recommend
Absolutely wonderful stay! The space is comfortable and clean and the hosts were very helpful and responsive. Will definitely stay here again when coming through town!
Comfortable, clean and cozy. Great stay!
A cool, clean space to spend the night.
Amazing place to stay at in Richmond. Blew my expectations when it came to looks & comfort. Thank you for this wonderful experience :)
We had a great stay in a great place! The loft was convenient, attractive and just FUN!. I would recommend this to anyone.

Absolutely fantastic stay—it does not get any better than this. The loft is beautifully restored with original details yet modern and thoughtfully decorated and furnished. It was perfectly clean as well. The location is wonderful; very walkable to nearby restaurants in charming little Richmond. I had no issue with noise, as others pointed out and the small fan in the bedroom provides nice white noise in the case one is sensitive to the train or noises outside. And the hosts, Oliver and Miranda, were so friendly and quick to respond; they seemed to truly care about your experience. I even forgot an item and they were so kind, going above and beyond to orchestrate getting it back. I would hands down book again. Thank you again, Oliver and Miranda; I wouldn’t have wanted to spend my birthday anywhere else!
Great place for our crew to stay at for our out of town work. First choice if we send our crew back to Richmond for work.

This was a good location for us. The bed and couch are so comfortable and the living room and kitchen are very spacious! It’s fun to hear the trains go by and if you are sensitive to sound, they have air purifiers that help cover up outside noise. The linens and towels are great! This is a one of a kind, ecological haven that has a treehouse feel. It's a special prefab house from the 1950's called TechBuilt, a rustic 2 level design in which the lower level functions as a quasi-basement and the upper level as a quasi-attic. The ceiling of the upper level goes all the way up to the peaked roof so it has a cathedral feel. The walls are almost all window, looking out on a woodsy neighborhood and backyard, which features a geodesic dome, a tiny house, and a chicken coop. We bought fresh eggs while we were there. The apartment features warm wood paneling, nice antiques, and beautiful plants. There are books by the host on the book shelves along with games and DVDs. We watched a great old Clark Gable and Claudette Colbert film. We found the bed overly soft, but we're not used to memory foam. The wood smoke smell was intense, but we got used to it and our clothes did not smell afterward. This place is extremely peaceful, unique, relaxing, and affordable. We loved it.

I have a severe dust allergy, am immune compromised, and have celiac disease, which means that I can get sick from small food particles. The inside of the microwave was covered with food splatters and crumbs, the fridge had some kind of dirt or food stuff in the bottom, and the bathtub had enough dust and hair on it that it really looked like it hadn't been cleaned. I showed these things to Pat and she said that I must be a picky cleaner. I explained about my celiac disease and she pushed back, asking questions about how the crumbs could make me sick. At that point, she did do a quick wipe of the fridge, but made no attempt to clean the bathroom. I found the microwave issue later, but had no confidence that she would respond well, so I didn't bother to say anything. I did use the cleaner she had around and completely cleaned the bathroom and as much of the kitchen area as was safe for me to touch. The cloth I used came up dirty enough that it really seemed that it hadn't been cleaned. And then when I went to plug in my phone in the bedroom, I found a bunch of dust or dirt behind the dresser. So I won't be going back, but I do think it's a nice place to stay, especially for the cost, if you don't need it to be particularly clean.
