Beautiful apartment but it just wasn’t very clean. The beds and kitchen were clean but the whole place wasn’t dusted or swept and the bathroom… especially the shower wasn’t very clean. Be aware that due to location, you will hear trains and sirens most of the night.
The two free breakfasts at Roscoe was a nice touch. Thank you for that!!
The place was great!!
Our stay was spur of the moment and went very smoothly. The loft was exactly as described and an awesome place to stay. Super cute decor!!
Wonderfully put together, easy instructions for accessing the property, accommodations for drinks and food around the corner.

As always, I am blessed to have such a nice location to take photos that is located in downtown Richmond. Comfortable and homy, as well as the perfect vibe to do photo shoots. The window lighting is awesome.

Mike and Terri were absolutely amazing! Great hosts!! The loft was gorgeous and very much "my style" of a space. I didn't see a lot of reviews that mentioned the train - one review said they could hear it "off in the distance." I have to respectfully disagree. It was a bit too noisy for my preference, but everyone likes a certain cup of tea, I suppose!
Absolutely beautiful loft! Perfect location in town but quiet. I felt right at home. Would definitely stay again
Place was super nice and the location was convenient. Definitely want to stay again sometime!

We had such a wonderful experience here. The flat was beautiful, and the accommodations were amazing. Lots to do within walking distance, and if you prefer to stay there and relax, the furniture was very comfortable to recline back on and relax. The only drawback was the small water heater, which shortened shower time. However, once I knew that it wasn't an issue. Most definitely looking forward to visiting this beautiful flat again.

This place really is a hidden gem in Richmond. The pictures just don't do it any justice. You have to see it in person to appreciate all the magic this spot offers. We live about 15 minutes away and were in need of a small get away for some R&R. We definitely felt transported to a place we'd never been before with this location. The open floor plan, high ceilings and décor are just beautiful. Everything was very clean, beds were super comfy, and make sure to soak in that tub! We will absolutely be returning to this loft. Hands down, 5 stars!

This loft is beautiful and was perfect for our girls night away. The only thing we didn’t like was how close to the railroad tracks we were. The train is frequent and loud. But overall, it was a wonderful stay. Highly recommend you try Roscoe’s coffee and Lulu’s tacos.
Such a neat little place. The details and old school charm made our visit one we will always remember. Very comfortable and all the little extras to make us feel like home.
The place is beautiful! Will definitely book again!
Fantastic loft and a great location!

We love staying here! It is a such a gem in a small town. The hosts are warm and friendly and it’s so easy to relax and read a book, play a board game, or make an elaborate dinner in the kitchen together.

A beautifully repurposed space! We loved the comfortable couches and egg chair, the beautiful chandelier, updated and clean kitchen and bath. Be aware there is a moderately steep flight of stairs upon entry and only a curtain separating the sleeping space. Perfect for an adult couple’s getaway. Carefully decorated, not overdone, and all the conveniences are there (coffee, sweeteners, glassware, etc.). The mattress was just okay. The location is fabulous! Don’t miss all the neat history across the street in the furniture store, or the adorable used bookstore down the block. Street parking was free and easy. Door code lock was simple to operate. Coincidentally, the antique books in the bedroom are the same set we have at home, passed down by my great-grandfather. We took it as a sign we were meant to stay there!

The pictures don’t do this beautiful home justice! It was perfect for our family: 2 adults, 2 teens. Plenty of room, very clean and convenient location. We are originally from the area but moved several hours away. We will definitely be booking this again. We’ve found our go-to place for our trips back home.
Great place and vibe!!! Absolutely perfect place to do photo shoots!!!
This place was an absolute gem. If you’re needing a place to stay in Richmond there can’t possibly be a better option, hotel other Airbnb or otherwise.

We had such an amazing time staying at The Starr Loft! The area had so much to do and see, and the loft itself had such perfect vibes. From the beautiful decorative touches (the chandelier really makes you appreciate the exposed beams and soaring ceilings), to the fully equipped kitchen perfect for preparing food for a night in, it gives off eclectic luxury in the best way! Definitely check out the little museum on the Earlham campus if you have the chance to stay at the loft; it is a really impressive collection for a small school and the staff will walk you through and let you get hands on with reptiles! Also, can’t end this review without mentioning Mike and Terri as hosts; absolutely stellar communication and everything was easy and clear!
We had an excellent stay and perfect for our visit with our daughter at Earlham. So easy and comfortable and spacious. We will be back!
The loft is absolutely AMAZING! Loved the decor and free breakfast at Roscoe's. Highly recommend!
Gorgeous, spacious loft with very nice amenities. I wish we could have stayed to enjoy longer!
Best place to stay when visiting my hometown in Richmond very cozy and plenty of space my family always feels right at home
We had an awesome stay at Starr Loft for a quick getaway! Definitely a unique and fun place. Hosts were super responsive and helpful. Would recommend!
Great location and beautiful space. Highly recommend to others!
Neat space and full of character! The listing was as described, and Mike was a great and responsive host. No issues. Definitely one of the better options in Richmond.
Such a lovely space! Cannot wait to stay again!
I can’t wait for the opportunity to stay at the loft again! So spacious and comfortable. It’s a gem in Richmond’s Depot District!
Great place to stay!
Do yourself a favor and book it. Wonderful place!
It's a very beautiful place, in walking distance to a lot of small attractions. Some things inside were a little bit hard to navigate, but overall worth it!

We had a nice stay at this Airbnb. The building was amazing and we loved the uniqueness and decoration. The only thing to be aware of is the train that came through multiple times. We live in the quiet countryside so it seemed loud to us however if you are used to city living you wouldn’t mind it. Highly recommend the hosts they were awesome!

We loved our stay at The Starr Loft!! We would highly recommend it to anyone wanting to stay in Richmond. We will certainly be back whenever we find ourselves in need of a night away. We also loved our breakfast at Roscoe's.
The place was absolutely beautiful and breakfast at Roscoe's was delicious!

This place was even more cool and unique than the pictures portrayed! The communication from Mike and Terri was thorough and timely. We had a great stay and hope to make it back someday to spend more time. Highly recommend!
This place is gorgeous! Wish we could have stayed longer.
Such a cute space
Loved this loft! Such a cool place to stay!!
This place is great It was our 2nd time here We loved it Its awesome

Wow! This place delivers! Beautiful kitchen and appliances, perfect ombiance with the chandelier lighting in the living room, a cozy bedroom with a comfy bed, and romantically perfect bathroom. Everything was FANTASTIC! The area is historic and so cool. Loved walking to grab our breakfast and even that place is cool! Don't hesitate because this has it all and then some! I'm on a personal hunt to get leather couches just like in the loft. Couldn't be more pleased about our stay!
We had a wonderful time staying at the Loft! We loved the Richmond area, and all Mike & Terri’s suggestions! This was our first time staying in an air bnb, and it was a pleasant experience.
This is an awesome place to stay, centrally located with parking outside the front door. Updated to a very industrial chic look. Top Notch !
This place is absolutely beautiful. Its clean, comfortable, and great location. Definitely recommend and we plan to be back.
This host was very helpful. We look forward to coming back.

What a absolutely beautiful place to stay it definitely put us in the mood for antiquing. Loved that they offer complimentary breakfast and drinks for each day of our stay at Roscoes and it was delicious and good coffee. It was perfect for our stay in Richmond. So much history in the loft and the town. We will be back for sure.
Unique setting. The place is great. We enjoyed it very much.

Beautiful loft space. Very clean. Comfy bed, we slept well. We were in from out-of-state to ride the 60 mile Cardinal Greenway Trail, and this was conveniently close by. We had a little trouble getting the door unlocked, but once the motorcycles stopped roaring by we could hear the lock whirr in response to the code. As directed, we parked our van on the street with the bicycles inside, and had no problems. We could see the car from the second floor front window. We didn’t spend much time trying to figure out the TVs, but they seemed mostly streaming-oriented. We didn’t use the breakfast option (a web search said it was .3 miles away?) because we wanted an early start on the bike trail, which was a great trail.
Cool spot in a cool neighborhood. Very fun space great for a visit to Richmond.
This was a great place, we would certainly recommend!’n
What an amazing place! Very clean, great industrial/vintage decor, great communication from the host, and prime location to do the Antique Alley Trails. I plan on going back again!

This was my second stay at Starr Loft, and won't be my last I am sure. I love this place so much! It is beautifully decorated and there are so many cool little touches. It just feels so calm and peaceful in the apartment. And, free breakfast at Roscoes! That was a great perk.
Spent one great evening in the loft! We shall be back soon!

Was just “Wowed!” when our family walked in. Having never lived or stayed in a place like this before, you’ll never want to leave. We were so comfortable like no place ever. Space for everyone, the modern kitchen, and the temperature is perfect. I’m looking forward to returning if there’s availability. Thank you Mike and Terri.

Beautiful place. Very clean. The building is definitely historic and goes with the little area it’s in. Only stayed for the night but would love to come back and explore some more!! The train in the distance was new to us but added to its uniqueness. The kitchen living room and bed room are beautiful. And how could we forget the shower, the whole family now wants an awesome shower like that! Host are amazing communicated extremely quickly as we booked seriously last minute!

We had a great time staying at Mike & Terri's, it's right downtown and very close to everywhere we went over the weekend. We did not get a chance to check out any of the businesses around the area to give a solid recommendation but read several reviews on Roscoe's and a bit bummed we were not able to make it. Since the place is right downtown there were a few times where loud bikes or even the occasional police car would come by though personally did not bother us especially with a small speaker. We look forward to booking this place again in the future as we were beyond impressed overall !
Amazing space. Unique space in a cool area. Loved staying there. I already miss the incredible shower.
Very nice loft space.

The Starr Loft is absolutely stunning! The interior design is to die for. Honestly, we didn’t want to leave! It’s worth noting that the space underneath the loft is no longer Roscoes, but is now called Community of Faith. Just wanted to put that out there in case you’re looking for Roscoes upon arriving. Our stay was lovely and we will be booking this place again when we come back to Richmond.

This gorgeous loft is in a quiet neighborhood and I would definitely recommend staying here. Hosts were wonderful and accommodating. It was affordable. The vibes of the space are very rustic luxury. Even the beautiful photos do not do it justice. I could have just spent my vacation staying in and enjoying all of the ambience of the loft. Roscoe’s is a cute spot with swanky energy, I ended up buying a piece of art and enjoying a vegan smoothie. We arrived late in the night and felt safe in the streets unloading. Big gorgeous windows overlooking the streets. One of the most amazing showering experiences I’ve ever had. Perfect water pressure and temperature. Very clean everything. I hope to return and am thankful this spot is here!!
Absolutely amazing place to stay while we visited the University of Indiana East for our daughter. We we will back:)

A comfortable place to stay, close to lots to do! The hosts are responsive. We didn’t have any kiddos with us, but I don’t think this place would be well-suited for littles due to the open staircase and the general openness of the space. But, for a couple of a group of friends, it’s great!
Booked this apartment as a gift for my brother and his girlfriend, and they loved it! A gorgeous space in an incredible location.
We loved the quaint, quiet loft! Perfect for a couples getaway or a family!

We loved staying at the Starr Loft. The property was so much fun for our family of four (my wife and I and our two children, ages 13 and 9). We definitely will return the next time that we are in the area.
Thanks so much, Mike and Terri!
The Loft is the perfect spot to reconnect and recharge. We enjoyed the large sofas for family movie night. We participated in the Chocolate Trail in Richmond. We enjoyed lots of yummy treats.
Awesome place

This place was absolutely lovely. The only thing I’ll mention is that if you are easily bothered by noise there is a train that comes through frequently and is very loud. Other than that we loved the space!
The place was beautiful!
Great location and plenty of space. Walking distance to restaurants and bars. Close to Cardinal Greenway Trail.

This place is one of a kind. Super cool and has all you’ll need for a great stay. Can’t think of a thing we didn’t like about the loft! Roscoe’s has moved so it’s no longer just below the loft, but it’s only a couple short blocks. The breakfast was delicious! We also stopped for a drink at their tap room, inexpensive and very cool setting.
Thanks for a great stay!
Of note, this is a downtown out of the 60-70’s that seems to be going through some needed changes. We look forward to seeing the revitalization!
Beautiful place! Would love to stay here again.
Lovely, roomy loft with everything you need. Would recommend to anyone looking to overnight in Richmond.
This place is so unique! It’s such a great space! Industrial, historical but felt like home. Full kitchen, open concept living room/dining is awesome. Would definitely stay there again!

This was the most beautiful loft! The decor is so on point for the space! We loved the vibe of the space and really appreciated the fast internet & TV selections! It is located in a great location!! Easy to get to everything! Love Roscoes breakfast as well!! Highly recommend staying here!! You won’t be disappointed!!
Great place to stay - comfy bed. Gorgeous accommodation!
Very unique place. Mix of modern and antique. Lovely loft experience. Parking was convenient. Located right downtown.
What a wonderful space! I felt like time-travelling and enjoyed looking at all the curious memorabilia on display - and the state of art kitchen...I wish I could have stayed longer.
Awesome space and exactly as described!
just an amazing place to stay and relax, get dinner and drinks
Such a great find! You won’t be disappointed with the loft. We didn’t want to leave. Great hosts.
This loft space was spacious and beautiful. We will definitely be coming back to stay again!
Great value, location, clean, spacious, fun décor.
Love this space. Can’t wait to stay again.
Beautiful stay!
Another perfect stay at the loft! Will definitely stay here again!
This is the spot! Great place, great people!
Aesthetically perfect.
wonderful location, close to everything, clean and has a beautiful full kitchen! would ABSOLUTELY stay again
Wonderful location. Beautiful place.
Tired of the cookie cutter places to stay? Do the Loft. We were visiting family in the area and it was a cozy place to gather.
Wonderful place!
Really nice 👌
You will not be disappointed with this charming place to stay! It was so charming and everything you would need is there. 1,000% would recommend.

We purchase a night at the Star Loft for our son and daughter-in-law as a Christmas gift. They could not stop raving about it. They said it was beautiful and spacious. The hosts were available and very friendly. They have already booked a return stay for New Year!s Eve. Thanks for a great experience.
Such a cool space. It was so cool we decided to get beer and food to go and just hang out in the loft.
Beautiful place, great location and the hosts were very responsive. The loft is very clean and has everything you would need. We would stay again!
Great stay!
Beautiful place and will stay again.
Cute and charming aesthetic
Terrific place in a historic area. Lovely decor! Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Exactly how it is pictured. Would stay again.
Wonderful place
Good location and fun space.

Beautiful, spacious apartment in a super cool building in a historic district. Take time to appreciate the carefully curated objects throughout. Clean and comfortable—a great place for an extended stay. Slightly disappointed the coffee shop is no longer "downstairs," but still close enough to walk.
Second stay. Lovely, special spot. Very quiet even on Saturday night. The town is very sleepy on Sunday morning- it was a challenge to find an open coffee shop. But the calm and quiet was wonderful.
We eloped in October and opted to have some bridal pictures in the venue where we spent our night away from it all. The place has a lot of space, romance, and history. We loved it.
Adorable spot in Richmond!

Really a neat little place. We were just passing though and it happened to be at a good stopping point. But, I am sure when the weather was nice and on a weekend this would be a really fun spot to hangout and walk around Richmond.
Very clean and had every amenity you would need.
Honesty, the best Richmond has to offer! Clean, everything you need, easy check in, easy free parking and very room!
Always great to stay at The Loft!! Stairs are a little iffy, but take them slow. ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL UP THERE!!
Highly recommend even if you have kids with you. The place was $15 more than a typical hotel room and was much better!

This was our second time staying at the Starr Loft. It’s a unique and wonderful place to stay. Great location near Richmond restaurants and cafes. We were biking on the Cardinal Greenway trail, and the Loft is close to the trailhead. We hope we can stay with Mike and Terri again next time we come to Richmond!

This stay was perfect. They have most of the tools you need ready to go, and there is enough nearby to where if you want something specific you can grab it! I highly recommend grabbing this if you're gonna be doing things in the area, or just wanna vibe in this super cute and edgy place. Loved it.
The Loft was BEAUTIFUL.✨ Perfect for our weekend getaway, and the location with a coffee shop and other small stores within walking distance, was lovely.
Great place. I love all the architecture and the bed is super comfortable. The island in the kitchen is a great hang out!! Love everything about this place and will be coming back soon!!!
Beautiful comfortable apartment within easy walking distance of historic Richmond and the Depot district, the Cardinal Greenway as well as museums and restaurants.

The place is absolutely beautiful! I loved everything about the ambiance and it was perfect for my stay before catching the Whitewater Valley train the following morning! I would recommend this place to anyone who is staying in the area! We will definitely be back if we end up back in the area!
Fun and unique stay - lots of space and privacy - great location to walk for dinner:-)
Great historic location that was decorated so very nicely. Loved the space and had a great time.

Hands down the best place to have your bridal party get ready! All of my maids were in love with the loft and it was perfect for professional photos. So cozy and beautiful and overall perfect.
Thanks Mike & Terri!
The most Amazing place ive stayed in, loved it
Beautifully decorated and well appointed. In a grid area for shopping and restaurants.
The loft is incredible. Cool decor, very well furnished. You won't want to leave. Plenty of nearby Door Dash and InstaCart options as well.
This loft is very tastefully done and a peaceful location to stay. It’s well equipped and you can walk to restaurants around the area. We’ll definitely stay again if in town visiting family.

I won't be returning here. It is not clean enough for someone who likes things really clean. For example, I was looking forward to taking a bath but there were hairs in the tub and there were feathers and dust on the living room floor. The cool factor of living in an old loft is dampened by the fact that the ceilings are so high and the HVAC infrastructure is visible so who knows how many insects and dust are there. Plus the industrial AC is really loud! It rained a lot the night I was there and there was a leak from the ceiling dripping next to the kitchen.
Unique location with a true loft feel. We loved the decor and feeling the history of the building. Look forward to the next stay!

Mold in shower; no hot water; no mattress pad on old awful mattress; leftover food in fridge; throw rugs everywhere covering stained carpet; no cable tv; no porch lights to illuminate tripping hazards of sidewalk and porch; mold growing up siding all over front of house; no street sign or street number; furnished entire house with throwaway furniture; don’t go! Couldn’t move after 1 night on mattress; didn’t stay 2nd night; not clean; hair in shower
